name: Twin Bee Retro Jam
description:
If I upload the full game on the browser, the game gets laggy, So , I have uploaded only one level. If you want to play the full game, you can download the compressed file.

Tried to make Nes Twin Bee game to newer retro design.

Control

move W,A,S,D

shoot  SPACE BAR

bomb KEY M

I have not  used the theme
